faq.question: What is the process of date change/reissue of the ticket for a child who will be crossing the child age to adult?
faq.answer: You can request a date change or ticket reissue through the platform. Specific policies depend on the airline, so we’ll guide you based on your flight details.

faq.question: Why is there no Airfare rules mentioned?
faq.answer: We follow the airline's refund policy and airlines have different policies for different flights. We’ll be able to let you know the refund policy for a specific flight.

faq.question: Can you provide the room rates per person or room-wise on VIAJIA?
faq.answer: Yes, room rates can be checked per person or per room on VIAJIA. Rates vary depending on the property, dates, and occupancy.

faq.question: Can I check for budget hotels on Share Trip?
faq.answer: Yes, you can filter hotels by budget on Share Trip to find options that fit your requirements.

aboutViajia.title: About VIAJIA
aboutViajia.content:
About VIAJIA

VIAJIA is an AI-powered travel platform designed to help you create fully personalized and real-time travel itineraries in seconds. Our mission is to make trip planning simple, fast, and tailored to each traveler’s needs, preferences, and budget.


Our vision

To become the leading global travel-planning solution powered by intelligent automation and personalization.


Our commitment

Deliver transparent, reliable technology and truly traveler-centric experiences.
